local_schema.short_desc: Sleep timeout display when on UPS
local_schema.longdesc: The amount of time in seconds the computer on UPS power needs to be inactive before the display goes to sleep.

local_schema.short_desc: Sleep timeout display when on battery
local_schema.longdesc: The amount of time in seconds the computer on battery power needs to be inactive before the display goes to sleep.

local_schema.short_desc: Sleep timeout display when on AC
local_schema.longdesc: The amount of time in seconds before the display goes to sleep when the computer is on AC power.

local_schema.short_desc: Sleep timeout computer when on UPS
local_schema.longdesc: The amount of time in seconds the computer on UPS power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep.

local_schema.short_desc: Sleep timeout computer when on battery
local_schema.longdesc: The amount of time in seconds the computer on battery power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep.

local_schema.short_desc: Sleep timeout computer when on AC
local_schema.longdesc: The amount of time in seconds the computer on AC power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep.
